translations: n.墨西哥流浪乐队；墨西哥流浪乐队艺人

phrs.translation: 墨西哥街头乐队, 玛丽亚西, 墨西哥流浪乐队, 乐队
杀手悲歌, 马里亚奇, 世事无绝对, 刺客悲歌

sentences.sentence: My father was a singer in a mariachi band.
sentences.translation: 我父亲是一只街头小乐队的一名歌手。

sentences.sentence: El Mariachi: Bless me, Father, for I have just killed quite a few men.
sentences.translation: 请保佑我，神父，因为我刚杀死了很多人。

sentences.sentence: The first thing I thought of after seeing the first photo was "El Mariachi".
sentences.translation: 我看到第一张照片后首先想到的是“手悲歌”。
